title: feat(quic): implement HANDSHAKE_DONE frame (RFC 9000 §19.20)
body:
## RFC 9000 Section 19.20: HANDSHAKE_DONE Frame

### Overview
Implement handshake completion signal frame.

### Complexity: LOW (~50 lines)
Single-byte frame sent by server to confirm handshake.

### Key Requirements
- Frame Type: 0x1e
- No fields (empty frame)
- Server-only: MUST NOT be sent by client
- Signals handshake keys can be discarded

### Implementation
**Files:**
- `include/quic/SocketQUICFrame.h`

**Functions:**
```c
size_t SocketQUICFrame_encode_handshake_done(uint8_t *out);
// Returns 1 (just the type byte)
```

### Dependencies
- #384 (Section 12 - Frame infrastructure)
